{{BLP unsourced|date=March 2019}} {{Infobox person |image = | | | name = Beverley Breuer | birth_name = Beverley Nordquist | birth_date = | birth_place = [[Regina, Saskatchewan]], Canada | spouse = {{marriage|Jacob-George Breuer
|1973|2002|end=divorced}}
{{marriage|Lee Binns
|2007}} | occupation= Actress | children = | years_active = 1999–present | awards = }} '''Beverley Breuer''' is a Canadian [[actress]] who has worked in television and film. She is best known for her work on 2003's ''[[Scary Movie 3]]'' and 2006's ''[[Scary Movie 4]]'' and for playing Sister Woodhouse on [[The CW]] series ''[[Riverdale (2017 TV series)|Riverdale]]''. ==
